name: Deadly Battle Shooting 2018
description: Welcome to play the Deadly Battle Shooting 2018 games. In this Shooting competition you are equipping with the latest new sniper rifles aiming at the enemies on the desert island. Army has responsibilities to save the people life and war with enemies.this is one of the best commando shooting. this game has stylized graphics and realistic thrilling environments. You can also feel the real amazing weapon shooting effective sound on this Deadly Battle Shooting 2018.
